item.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: Trump calls on USAID to be closed down
item.description: President Donald Trump has begun his second administration with a series of controversial moves and decisions.

item.title: WATCH: Michael Strahan, Will Reeve get ready for Super Bowl LIX
item.description: The “GMA” co-anchor and correspondent prepare for the big game between the Kansas City Chiefs and Philadelphia Eagles.

item.title: Netanyahu gifts Trump golden pager in nod to Lebanon explosions
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu gifted President Donald Trump a golden pager during their meeting at the White House this week.

item.title: New York shuts down live poultry markets after bird flu detected
item.description: Officials said the shutdowns are prudent steps.
